item.title: Hole in pavement cover, 15th August
item.description:
Hole on pavement where there is a cover. Someone could easily slip in or trip. As it is damaged the hole could get bigger. Dangerous for anyone walking along there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Road, Penge, London

item.title: Forest bike, 15th August

item.title: Will anyone from the council ever respond?!, 15th August
item.description:
Hopedale Road, more rubbish again. The entire street is littered with pooey nappies and there is literal poo everywhere. It’s an absolute health hazard and my child cannot walk up the street without stepping in something. Please take action and provide house number 5 with a large enough bin for their 2 adults and 8 kids. We live on a lovely street and it’s not fair that it’s become such a mess since the family and number 5 moved in. PLEASE TAKE ACTION!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Hopedale Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 2b Achilles Road on top of Ajax Road, 15th August
item.description:
The door to the utility box has been missing for many months and I am reporting this as nothing has been done. Could you please replace the door. Best, Madhuban
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ajax Road, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load (Estates)

item.title: Nw67yq, 15th August
item.description:
Food recycling bin not emptied in weeks - overflowing. Also need a 2nd food recycling bin installed as took old one away and 1 bin not enough capacity for a block of 30 flats. Please also get Maintenance team inside block - fire door on 4th floor by lift is broken (has been for months) and lighting on 5th floor corridor has tripped/no lighting since the past week.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Failed Bin Collections, 15th August
item.description:
This has been an ongoing problem where our bins are not being collected on the schedule day as per the Royal Borough of Greenwich website: At Whitworth Road - London - SE18 3QG: your green and blue top bin is collected every Thursday. Your black top bin is collected every two weeks on Thursday Week A It’s very inconsistent with collection days for all bins. I have also noticed that there is not regular street sweeping on our road, this happens in and around our area however our road seems to be missed. Please advise on the solution to these problems. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitworth Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet
